channel.title: Enfinity scape! V1.5 Source!ANd client, Client is 508AND317!
channel.description:
[size=10pt]Hello guys heres my new version of enfinity scape![/size]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/315laap.jpg[/img]
[size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]People have been saying link is down , i will be posting new once, ALONG WITH CLIENT in a second[/size][/size][/size]
Comment please :)
Also i had to make a new account i forgot my old account name and forgot email i used :s Have fun! Rate&hate [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=X1HXQ3WV]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=X1HXQ3WV[/url] Notes
Working dbowspec Working GWD Added a new home fixed duel arena Added a brand new auction system with an auction house! Added a horse, YOU CAN RIDE type ::Mount I will be getting a pic of hydrobarrage!~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits 30% me 50% delta 20% Jagex
NEW CLIENT http://i37.tinypic.com/v8eaex.png
